text:
="preserve">Edgar Laverne Olson (October 19, 1937 – August 20, 2020) was an American politician. He was in the Minnesota House of Representatives between 1985 to 1998. He was born in Fosston, Minnesota. He was a member of the Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party.
Olson died on August 20, 2020 at a hospital in Madison, Minnesota at the age of 82.
